Annotation.String: Oem data related to the Storage Controller.
Oem data related to the Storage Controller.
Current RAID Mode is Linux.
Current RAID Mode is Linux.
Current RAID Mode is Windows.
Current RAID Mode is Windows.
Current RAID Mode is Mixed.
Current RAID Mode is Mixed.
Current RAID Mode is None.
Current RAID Mode is None.
The Copy Back function is turned off in the RAID Adapter.
The Copy Back function is turned off in the RAID Adapter.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Copy Back after driver replacement.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Copy Back after driver replacement.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Copy Back to a hotspare when a SMART alert is detected.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Copy Back to a hotspare when a SMART alert is detected.
Patrol Read unconfigured mode disabled.
Patrol Read unconfigured mode disabled.
Patrol Read unconfigured mode enabled.
Patrol Read unconfigured mode enabled.
Patrol Read Mode is disabled.
Patrol Read Mode is disabled.
Patrol Read is automatically started and stopped by the RAID Adapter.
Patrol Read is automatically started and stopped by the RAID Adapter.
Patrol Read must be manually started and stopped on the RAID Adapter.
Patrol Read must be manually started and stopped on the RAID Adapter.
The RAID Adapter supports normal Check Consistency operation.
The RAID Adapter supports normal Check Consistency operation.
The RAID Adapter supports Check Consistency in which the operation will stop on an error.
The RAID Adapter supports Check Consistency in which the operation will stop on an error.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Battery Learn Cycle as needed.
The RAID Adapter will perform a Battery Learn Cycle as needed.
The RAID Adapter will issue a warning when a Battery Learn Cycle is needed, otherwise no action.
The RAID Adapter will issue a warning when a Battery Learn Cycle is needed, otherwise no action.
The RAID Adapter will take no action when a Battery Learn Cycle is needed.
The RAID Adapter will take no action when a Battery Learn Cycle is needed.
Load Balancing is inactive.
Load Balancing is inactive.
Automatic Load Balancing is active.
Automatic Load Balancing is active.
Volume preparation mode is Fast.
Volume preparation mode is Fast.
Volume preparation mode is Slow.
Volume preparation mode is Slow.
Enhanced auto import disabled.
Enhanced auto import disabled.
Enhanced auto import enabled.
Enhanced auto import enabled.
Persistent hotspare mode is disabled.
Persistent hotspare mode is disabled.
Persistent hotspare mode is enabled.
Persistent hotspare mode is enabled.
Controller mode is EnhancedHBA.
Controller mode is EnhancedHBA.
Controller mode is HBA.
Controller mode is HBA.
Controller mode is None.
Controller mode is None.
Controller mode is RAID.
Controller mode is RAID.
Boot Mode is User.
Boot Mode is User.
Boot Mode is Continue Boot On Error.
Boot Mode is Continue Boot On Error.
Boot Mode is Headless.
Boot Mode is Headless.
Boot Mode is Headless Safe.
Boot Mode is Headless Safe.
A resource representation of DellController.
A resource representation of DellController.
This property shall represent the controller cache size in MB.
This property shall represent the controller cache size in MB.
The property shall represent the controllers support of cachecade virtual disk creation.
The property shall represent the controllers support of cachecade virtual disk creation.
This property gives information about the Firmware Version installed on the Controller.
This property gives information about the Firmware Version installed on the Controller.

This property represents the controller slot type. The possible values of the string can be Other, Unknown, PCI Express x8, PCI Express Gen 3, PCI Express Gen 3x1, PCI Express Gen 3x2, PCI Express Gen 3x4, PCI Express Gen 3x8, PCI Express Gen 3x16, or PCI Express Gen4.

This property represents the controller slot type. The possible values of the string can be Other, Unknown, PCI Express x8, PCI Express Gen 3, PCI Express Gen 3x1, PCI Express Gen 3x2, PCI Express Gen 3x4, PCI Express Gen 3x8, PCI Express Gen 3x16, or PCI Express Gen4.
This property shall represent the controller driver version.
This property shall represent the controller driver version.
The property shall represent the possible encryption states on the controller.
The property shall represent the possible encryption states on the controller.
The property shall represent the current encryption state on the controller.
The property shall represent the current encryption state on the controller.
The property shall represent the associated PCI slot.
The property shall represent the associated PCI slot.
This property shall represent the current state of the patrol read operation.
This property shall represent the current state of the patrol read operation.
RollupStatus provides overall health status of the system by considering their sub-component health statuses, e.g RollupStatus will be degraded if any one of the sub-component is degraded.
RollupStatus provides overall health status of the system by considering their sub-component health statuses, e.g RollupStatus will be degraded if any one of the sub-component is degraded.
The property shall represent the controller security configuration information.
The property shall represent the controller security configuration information.
The property shall represent the controllers support of sliced virtual disk creation and shall have one of the following values:0 - Sliced Virtual Disk not supported, 1-Sliced Virtual Disk supported.
The property shall represent the controllers support of sliced virtual disk creation and shall have one of the following values:0 - Sliced Virtual Disk not supported, 1-Sliced Virtual Disk supported.
This property represents the state of Alarm if it is present.
This property represents the state of Alarm if it is present.
This property indicates FQDD of BootVD. If no VD is set as BootVD in the controller, this property is an empty string.
This property indicates FQDD of BootVD. If no VD is set as BootVD in the controller, this property is an empty string.
This property represents the count of SAS connectors.
This property represents the count of SAS connectors.
This property represents the PCI device.
This property represents the PCI device.
This property represents the bus width.
This property represents the bus width.
This property represents the controller slot length.
This property represents the controller slot length.
KeyID provides details about the Key identification on the controller when the controller is in Local Key Management mode.
KeyID provides details about the Key identification on the controller when the controller is in Local Key Management mode.
This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot(CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot(CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property represents the maximum PCI link speed that the controller is set to allow.
This property represents the maximum PCI link speed that the controller is set to allow.
This property represents the maximum possible PCI link speed, which is the speed this device is capable of.
This property represents the maximum possible PCI link speed, which is the speed this device is capable of.
This property indicates status of the persistent hotspare slot of the controller.
This property indicates status of the persistent hotspare slot of the controller.
This property indicates whether this controller supports Realtime.
This property indicates whether this controller supports Realtime.
The property provides the unique ID of the controller and is in hexadecimal form.
The property provides the unique ID of the controller and is in hexadecimal form.
This property indicates whether the controller allows shared assignments of slots, that is, whether the controller can access slots that are shared with other controllers.
This property indicates whether the controller allows shared assignments of slots, that is, whether the controller can access slots that are shared with other controllers.
This property indicates whether this controller supports setting of controller boot mode.
This property indicates whether this controller supports setting of controller boot mode.
This property represents the controller supports automatic foreign import operation when the device is in foreign import mode.
This property represents the controller supports automatic foreign import operation when the device is in foreign import mode.
This property indicates whether this controller supports uneven spans for RAID 10.
This property indicates whether this controller supports uneven spans for RAID 10.
This property indicates whether this controller supports T10 Protection Information (T10 PI).
This property indicates whether this controller supports T10 Protection Information (T10 PI).
This property provides the current Auto config behavior of the controller.RAID0 is applicble only for PERC 10.4.x or earlier releases.
This property provides the current Auto config behavior of the controller.RAID0 is applicble only for PERC 10.4.x or earlier releases.
This property of the controller provides information to the user regarding the mode in which the controller is currently on.
This property of the controller provides information to the user regarding the mode in which the controller is currently on.
This property represents whether a controller supports LKM to SEKM transition or not.
This property represents whether a controller supports LKM to SEKM transition or not.
The percentage of controller resources used for background initialization rate volumes.
This property shall contain the percentage of controller resources used for background initialization rate of volumes.
The property specifies the reconstruction rate.
The property specifies the reconstruction rate.
The percentage of controller resources used for patrol read rate.
This property shall contain the percentage of controller resources used for patrol read rate.
The property shall represent the maximum number of Spans that a Volume can have in a multi-span Raid Level.
The property shall represent the maximum number of Spans that a Volume can have in a multi-span Raid Level.
The property shall represent the maximum number of drives that can be present in a Span.
The property shall represent the maximum number of drives that can be present in a Span.
The property shall represent the maximum number of Volumes that can be created and managed by adapter.
The property shall represent the maximum number of Volumes that can be created and managed by adapter.
The property shall represent the number of patrol read runs performed by adapter.
The property shall represent the number of patrol read runs performed by adapter.
The property shall represent the amount of inactive time before a drive is considered idle and the disk spin down occurs.
The property shall represent the amount of inactive time before a drive is considered idle and the disk spin down occurs.
This property indicates mode of the persistent hotspare slot of the controller.
This property indicates mode of the persistent hotspare slot of the controller.
This property represents the controller supports automatic foreign import operation when the device is in foreign import mode.
This property represents the controller supports automatic foreign import operation when the device is in foreign import mode.
This property indicates the controller boot mode.
This property indicates the controller boot mode.
This property specifies the personality mode of the controller.
This property specifies the personality mode of the controller.
This property specifies the supported initialization types of the controller.
This property specifies the supported initialization of the controller.
This property specifies the load balancing mode of the controller.
This property specifies the load balancing mode of the controller.
This property specifies the Battery learning cycle mode of the controller.
This property specifies the Battery learning cycle mode of the controller.
This property specifies the check consistency mode of the controller.
This property specifies the check consistency mode of the controller.
This property specifies the patrol read mode of the controller.
This property specifies the patrol read mode of the controller.
This property specifies the patrol read unconfigured area setting mode on the adapter.
This property specifies the patrol read unconfigured area setting mode on the adapter.
This property specifies the copy back mode of the adapter.
This property specifies the copy back mode of the adapter.
This property specifies the current RAID mode.
This property specifies the current RAID mode.
